attr.title: Megazeux
attr.desc: MegaZeux is a game engine that features hundreds of user-created games, mostly in a retro, tile-based style. The games cover various genres, including RPGs, platformers, puzzles ans shoot 'm ups. They often use the engineâ€™s scripting system for unique mechanics and gameplay. With its simple graphics and creative possibilities, MegaZeux offers a wide variety of games to explore, all created by its community.
attr.inst: 1. Download over 500 games from DigitalMZX. 2. Place extracted game folders to roms/ports/megazeux/gamedata. 3. Run the games by selecting the mzx files in the built-in browser.
attr.inst_md:
- Install testing zip.
- Download over **500 games** from [DigitalMZX](https://www.digitalmzx.com/).
- Place extracted game folders to `roms/ports/megazeux/gamedata`.
- Run the games by selecting the mzx files in the built-in browser.
